com.registry

Class RegistryExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.registry.RegistryExporter

  • public final class RegistryExporter
extends Object

    A utility class which provides the ability to save registry information to either a *.reg or a *.txt file.

    This functionality differs from the RegistryKey.saveKey(File) method in that *.reg files can be double-clicked in Windows Explorer to automatically add the keys that were saved to the Windows Registry.

    Since:
    1.2
    Version:
    1.8
    Author:
    Yinon Michaeli

      Specifies the type of format to use when saving registry information.

    • Method Detail

      • exportKey

        public static boolean exportKey(File file,
                RegistryExporter.Format format,
                RegistryKey... keys)
        Exports the specified RegistryKey objects into the file specified.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to save the keys to.
        format - The file format to use when saving.
        keys - An array of RegistryKeys to save.
        Returns:
        true if the export was successful, false if an IOException occurred.
        Throws:
        RegistryException - if the format isn't supported on the current OS.
